trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered pair of floating-point x- and y-coordinates that defines a point in a two-dimensional plane.
trans-unit.target: 表示在二维平面中定义点的浮点 x 和 y 坐标的有序对。

trans-unit.source: To convert a <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> to a <xref:System.Drawing.Point>, use <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Round%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Truncate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 要转换<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>到<xref:System.Drawing.Point>，使用<xref:System.Drawing.Point.Round%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Drawing.Point.Truncate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal position of the point.
trans-unit.target: 该点的水平位置。

trans-unit.source: The vertical position of the point.
trans-unit.target: 该点的垂直位置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> class with the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 用指定坐标初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Translates a given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> by the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 按指定的大小平移给定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to translate.
trans-unit.target: 要平移的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that specifies the numbers to add to the coordinates of <c>pt</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，指定要增加到 <c>pt</c> 的坐标的数。

trans-unit.source: Translates a given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> by the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.
trans-unit.target: 按指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 平移给定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />。

trans-unit.source: The translated <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.
trans-unit.target: 平移后的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%2A> method adds the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> of the specified size to the x-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> and the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> to the y-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%2A>方法将添加<xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>到的 x 坐标指定大小的<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>和<xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>到的 y 坐标<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to translate.
trans-unit.target: 要平移的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> that specifies the numbers to add to the coordinates of <c>pt</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />，指定要增加到 <c>pt</c> 的坐标的数。

trans-unit.source: Translates a given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> by a specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />.
trans-unit.target: 按指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 平移给定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />。

trans-unit.source: The translated <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.
trans-unit.target: 平移后的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%2A> method adds the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> of the specified size to the x-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> and the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> to the y-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%2A>方法将添加<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A>到的 x 坐标指定大小的<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>和<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A>到的 y 坐标<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体中。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call `AddExample`, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 处理窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件并调用`AddExample`，并传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Represents a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> class with member data left uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 类的、成员数据未被初始化的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> contains the same coordinates as the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 是否包含与指定 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 有相同的坐标。

trans-unit.source: This method returns <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> and has the same coordinates as this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="obj" /> 是一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />，并且具有与此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 相同的坐标，则此方法将返回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 返回此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 结构的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: An integer value that specifies a hash value for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数值，指定此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 结构的哈希值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> is empty.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 是否为空。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> are 0; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> 均为 0，该值为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Translates the given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> by a specified size.
trans-unit.target: 按指定的大小平移给定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to translate.
trans-unit.target: 要平移的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that specifies the pair of numbers to add to the coordinates of <c>pt</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，指定要添加到 <c>pt</c> 坐标的数字对。

trans-unit.source: Translates a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> by a given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 平移给定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the translated <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回经过平移的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a shadow to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> using the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Addition%2A> operator.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加到卷影<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>使用<xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Addition%2A>运算符。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste this code into a form and call the `AddShadow` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将此代码粘贴到窗体并调用`AddShadow`方法时处理该窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件。

trans-unit.source: Make sure the form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> named `listBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 请确保该窗体包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>名为`listBox1`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to translate.
trans-unit.target: 要平移的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> that specifies the numbers to add to the x- and y-coordinates of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />，它指定要增加到 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 的 x 坐标和 y 坐标的数。

trans-unit.source: Translates the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> by the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />.
trans-unit.target: 按指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 平移 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />。

trans-unit.source: The translated <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.
trans-unit.target: 平移后的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Addition%2A> operator adds the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> of the specified size to the x-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> and the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> to the y-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Addition%2A>运算符将添加<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A>到的 x 坐标指定大小的<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>和<xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A>到的 y 坐标<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%28System.Drawing.PointF%2CSystem.Drawing.SizeF%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%28System.Drawing.PointF%2CSystem.Drawing.SizeF%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Addition%2A> operator.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Addition%2A>运算符。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体中。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call `opAdditionExample`, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 处理窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件并调用`opAdditionExample`，并传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: The result specifies whether the values of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> properties of the two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures are equal.
trans-unit.target: 此结果指定两个 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> 结构的 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 属性的值是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> values of the left and right <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果左边和右边的 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> 结构的 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 值相等，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Equality%2A> operator.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Equality%2A>运算符。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体中。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call `opAdditionExample`, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 处理窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件并调用`opAdditionExample`，并传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the coordinates of the specified points are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定点的坐标是否不等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> values of <paramref name="left" /> and <paramref name="right" /> are not equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 要指示 <paramref name="left" /> 和 <paramref name="right" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> 值不等，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Inequality%2A>运算符。

trans-unit.target: 表示此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.
